resources.string: Make Your Dream Trip Come True

C\'mon, he\'s not that bad. At least he\'s letting you borrow the car tomorrow night. Ho ho ho, look at it roll. Now we could watch Jackie Gleason while we eat. I guarantee it. Whoa, wait, Doc. Let\'s get him.
